ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Manage the R packages your project depends on in an isolated, portable, and reproducible way.
Manage the R packages your project depends on in an isolated, portable, and reproducible way.

name: r-packrat
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.9.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-packrat
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/packrat_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/packrat/packrat_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: db73e62a5c536fd16b6549a61d0dd109eff4f94ac6236c52de53bde2230f81d6

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('packrat')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('packrat')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/rstudio/packrat/
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Manage the R packages your project depends on in an isolated, portable, and reproducible way.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: packrat
# Type: Package
# Title: A Dependency Management System for Projects and their R Package Dependencies
# Version: 0.5.0
# Author: Kevin Ushey, Jonathan McPherson, Joe Cheng, Aron Atkins, JJ Allaire
# Maintainer: Kevin Ushey <kevin@rstudio.com>
# Description: Manage the R packages your project depends on in an isolated, portable, and reproducible way.
# License: GPL-2
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0)
# Imports: tools, utils
# Suggests: testthat (>= 0.7), devtools, httr, knitr, rmarkdown
# URL: https://github.com/rstudio/packrat/
# BugReports: https://github.com/rstudio/packrat/issues
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-11-13 23:16:36 UTC; kevin
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-11-14 08:40:02 UTC
